title: Super Mario Bros
description: Mustachioed plumber Mario must rescue Princess Peach from the villain Bowser, navigating through the dangerous and secret-filled Mushroom Kingdom.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: Young hero Link must rescue Princess Zelda and recover the Triforce pieces from the evil Ganon, exploring dungeons and solving puzzles.

title: Metroid
description: Bounty hunter Samus Aran explores planet Zebes to destroy the dangerous Metroids and face the space pirates' leader, Mother Brain.

title: Mega Man 2
description: Robot Mega Man must defeat the eight Robot Masters created by Dr. Wily, acquiring their special abilities to save the world.

title: Castlevania
description: Simon Belmont, a member of the vampire-hunting clan, invades Count Dracula's castle to defeat the lord of darkness and his army of monsters.

title: Donkey Kong
description: Mario (called Jumpman) must climb structures to rescue his girlfriend Pauline from the hands of the gorilla Donkey Kong.

title: Contra
description: Two elite soldiers, Bill Rizer and Lance Bean, infiltrate the alien Red Falcon base to save Earth from an extraterrestrial invasion.

title: Final Fantasy
description: Four Warriors of Light embark on a journey to restore the power of the four elemental crystals and save the world from darkness.

title: Kirby's Adventure
description: Kirby, a cute pink ball, sets out on an adventure to recover the pieces of the Star Rod and save Dream Land from King Dedede.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: The Ninja Turtles - Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Raphael - fight against the Foot Clan and Shredder to rescue their master Splinter.

title: Super Mario World
description: Mario and Luigi travel to Dinosaur Land to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser and his Koopalings, introducing Yoshi as a new companion.

title: The Legend of Zelda - A Link to the Past
description: Link must rescue Princess Zelda and defeat Ganon by traveling between the Light World and Dark World to save Hyrule.
imgSrc: images/covers/The Legend of Zelda - A Link to the Past.jpg

title: Super Metroid
description: Samus Aran returns to planet Zebes to investigate the theft of the last Metroid, facing new threats and exploring a massive interconnected world.

title: Chrono Trigger
description: A group of adventurers travel through time to prevent a global catastrophe, featuring multiple endings and an innovative combat system.

title: Super Mario Kart
description: The first installment of the Mario Kart series featuring characters from the Mario universe racing in go-karts with power-up items.

title: Donkey Kong Country
description: Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong must recover their stolen banana hoard from King K. Rool and the Kremlings in this revolutionary platformer.

title: Street Fighter II
description: The revolutionary fighting game where players choose from various martial artists to compete in a worldwide fighting tournament.

title: Final Fantasy II
description: A diverse group of rebels fight against the Gestahlian Empire in a steampunk fantasy world threatened by the mad clown Kefka.

title: Super Castlevania IV
description: Simon Belmont returns with enhanced whip mechanics to battle Dracula once more through haunting castles and treacherous landscapes.

title: Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars
description: Mario teams up with new allies in a turn-based RPG adventure to repair the Star Road and defeat the evil Smithy Gang.

title: Kirby's Dream Land 3
description: A mysterious dark cloud begins to loom over the sky, breaking Popstar's rings in the process and reaching over the distant corners of the world. Coo quickly tells Kirby that Popstar is in trouble, and they soon set off to protect the world once again.

title: EarthBound
description: A young boy named Ness embarks on a surreal adventure across America to collect melodies and stop an alien invasion.

title: Starwing 2
description: Fox McCloud leads a team of anthropomorphic animal pilots in arwing spacecraft to defend the Lylat system from Andross.

title: Mega Man X
description: A new era of Mega Man begins as X, a advanced reploid, battles against maverick reploids led by the sinister Sigma.

title: F-Zero
description: High-speed anti-gravity racing in the year 2560 where pilots compete in the deadly F-Zero Grand Prix for fame and fortune.

title: Alex Kidd in Miracle World
description: The iconic adventure of Alex Kidd as he uses his punching skills and vehicles to rescue his brother and defeat Janken the Great. The game was built into many Master System consoles

title: Phantasy Star
description: A pioneering sci-fi RPG where Alis sets out to avenge her brother's death and overthrow the tyrannical King Lassic across three planets

title: Sonic The Hedgehog
description: The 8-bit debut of Sonic the Hedgehog, featuring unique level designs as he speeds through zones to stop Dr. Robotnik's plans

title: Sonic The Hedgehog 2
description: A faster-paced sequel introducing Tails as a playable character, where Sonic races to stop Dr. Robotnik's latest scheme

title: Golden Axe Warrior
description: An action RPG with top-down Zelda-style gameplay. Embark on a quest to defeat the evil Death Adder and recover the legendary Golden Axe

title: Shinobi
description: The 8-bit adaptation of the legendary ninja game. As Joe Musashi, rescue kidnapped children using shurikens and ninjutsu across varied missions

title: Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap
description: An adventure where a hero cursed to live as a lizard-man must find a cure by exploring a vast world and defeating other cursed creatures

title: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse
description: Mickey Mouse embarks on a magical journey through enchanted worlds to rescue Minnie Mouse from the evil witch Mizrabel in this beloved platformer.

title: Double Dragon II: The Revenge
description: Billy and Jimmy Lee return in this classic beat 'em up sequel, seeking vengeance for the murder of Marian as they battle through the Shadow Warriors gang.

title: Golden Axe II
description: The barbarian warriors Ax Battler, Tyris Flare, and Gilius Thunderhead reunite to defeat the evil Dark Guld in this epic fantasy beat 'em up sequel.

title: Metal Slug
description: The iconic run-and-gun arcade classic comes to Mega Drive with intense action, detailed pixel art, and cooperative gameplay against General Morden's army.

title: Phantasy Star II
description: In this epic sci-fi RPG sequel, Rolf and his companions investigate a failing planetary system while battling bio-monsters and uncovering a dark conspiracy.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
description: Sonic teams up with Knuckles the Echidna in this acclaimed platformer featuring new power-ups, dynamic zones, and a memorable soundtrack.
